# How to use online state

## create your app

```ts
import { online } from 'reev/react'

export const App = () => {
        const online = useOnline()
        return <span>{online ? 'ğŸ“¶' : 'âŒ'}</span>
}
```

import { useOnline } from 'reev/react'

export const App = () => {
        const online = useOnline()
        return <span>{online ? 'ğŸ“¶' : 'âŒ'}</span>
}

<App />
